title: PVP.Net Patch Kernel has stopped working. Run as admin = computer freeze during load screen
body:
I've seen this issue in several threads but none of the solutions are working for me so far, when I open the game regularly the patch kernel error pops up immediately.
The game will open when I run as admin, but during the load screen after champion select my computer freezes to where the only thing I can do is manually power it off.
Help pls? :(

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be affected by the Windows 10 anniversary update that pushed changes to the Windows Game Bar. I recommend running League as admin after [disabling the game bar entirely.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if this helped.
